column2: "Na mese hom dɛ dodowara befi boka nye anee aba

column2: "ber a ahenman no ne mba no dze wɔbɔtow hɔn egu ekyirekyir sum no mu: mbrɛ osu nye asetwɛr wɔ no."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ nyimpa no nwanwa na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ebɛn nyimpa nye yi a mframa na po mpo wotsie no yi?"

column2: "Na odur esuegya no ho wɔ Gadarafo asaase do no
column3: nyimpa beenu bi a mbɔnsam afa hɔn behyiaa no kwan; wofi abodan mu na wɔyɛ abɔyafo mbordo dɛ
column4: ma ntsi obi nntum nntwa mu wɔ kwan no do."
Yɛnye wo wɔ ebɛn yɛ
column6: Nyankopɔn Ba? Ana ebaa ha dɛ erebɛhaw hɛn ansaana ber no edu?"

column2: "Na ofi hɔn nkyɛn kɔ ekyir kakra no
column3: mprekokuw kɛse bi wɔ hɔ ridzidzi."

column4: soma hɛn mprekokuw no mu."

column3: Hom nkɔ.  Na wopuei sii mu kɔr mpreko no mu; na hwɛ
column4: mprekokuw no nyina faa twitwi kesiaan ɔbo kronn no koguguu po no mu
column5: na wowuwui wɔ nsu no mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔrenyɛn hɔn no guanee kɔr kurow no mu kɛkaa ne nyina nye dza ɔbaa hɔn a mbɔnsam afa hɔn no do no ho asɛm."
"Na kurow no nyina fiir edzi behyiaa Jesus
column4: wɔserɛɛ no dɛ omfi hɔn ntoaado nkɔ."
